title: In Bangladesh, A 3rd Atheist Blogger Is Hacked To Death
teaser: Ananta Bijoy Das wrote for a website once moderated by another writer, killed in a similar way. To learn more, Steve Inskeep talks to Syed Zain Al-Mahmood of The Wall Street Journal in Dhaka.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
